promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare bear steel-type pokemon wearing a ancient crystal headband. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Critallursa, a a chibi cute rare bear steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Rush Up, Blessed Wings. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "steel" or "Critallursa". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bear-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: With its blessed wings, this petite ursine marvel, known as Critallursa, ascends mountain peaks. Light gleams down its metal-like fur as it rushes upwards, spreading joy in chilly heights.
